goal: Audit and modernize every frontend page to state-of-the-art UI/UX patterns, then run a final cross-page consistency pass via Gemini.
systemPrompt: You are a senior frontend engineer specializing in modern React UI/UX. You are modernizing pages in a warehouse management system to a consistent Phase 5 design system. Tech stack: React 19 + Vite 7 + Tailwind 4 + TypeScript + Zustand + TanStack Query. Design language: Zinc color palette, clean typography hierarchy, subtle micro-animations, responsive layouts. Reference page for visual consistency: InventoryCountPage.tsx. Every page you touch must feel cohesive with the pages already modernized â€” same spacing, color usage, component patterns, and interaction style. Prefer existing shared components from frontend/src/components/. Extract complex logic into custom hooks. Keep every page file under 350 LOC.

steps.title: UI/UX SOTA Refresh DashboardPage
steps.description: Audit DashboardPage for SOTA patterns (information hierarchy, interaction design, state management, accessibility, responsiveness, performance) and implement necessary UI/UX improvements including stable test coverage.
steps.successCriteria: (cd frontend && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build)

steps.title: Gemini Final UI/UX Consistency Pass
steps.description: Run a final end-to-end consistency pass across all 25 pages using Google/Gemini. Align patterns, states, and responsive behavior across every page. Close only when all gates are green.
steps.successCriteria: (cd frontend && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run test:e2e:a11y -- --project=web-desktop && npm run test:e2e:visual -- --project=web-desktop && npm run test:e2e:a11y:mobile && npm run test:e2e:visual:mobile) && ./scripts/check_design_token_drift.sh
